data.text:
Thank you to our sponsor: Valkre Attended the 2024 SAMA Conference? Valkre was there. We had an incredible time in Miami Beach, connecting with clients, partners, making many new friends, and discussing the future of Key Account Management (KAM). During our session with Pfizer, we delved into the remarkable impact of harmonizing their KAM program over the last year. The key takeaway? Good enough is not good enough anymore for KAM. We also uncovered that KAM data is the largest data set that no one has seen, underscoring the untapped potential within this space. If you want to see how the leading KAM teams are leveling up their programs, read the stories for yourself. ü§ù Connect with us to see the true potential of KAM in action. üóìÔ∏è Click here to read the stories or book a demo: [https://blog.valkre.com/] At Valkre, we believe in pushing boundaries and driving the future of KAM. Let‚Äôs shape the future together. #SAMA2024 #KAM #KeyAccountManagement #Innovation #StrategicPartnerships #ConferenceRecap #Pfizer #Networking #Valkre #KAMdata #LevelUpKAM

Ever wondered how visionary leadership is transforming healthcare? Dive into an exclusive conversation with Samanta De Filippi, the driving force behind Lo.Li. Pharma International's success. This dialogue gains depth from Luciano Onder, a national treasure in scientific broadcasting, whose decades-long work has profoundly influenced Italy's healthcare dialogue. Their conversation promises insightful revelations on the future of global health. üéôÔ∏è‚ú® Dive into the heart of healthcare innovation as they shed light on Lo.Li.Pharma srl's journey, from its inception by Prof. Vittorio Unfer MD to its global reach today. Discover the intricate blend of passion and scientific rigor that drives our company's philosophy and how we're shaping the future of healthcare. üåçüí° Get a behind-the-scenes look at our product development and safety protocols, ensuring the highest quality in "Made in Italy" products. Plus, don't miss the exclusive insights into our marketing strategies and international expansion plans! üöÄ üí≠ What's the secret to our successful worldwide engagement? How do we maintain empathy and cultural understanding in our global ventures? Find out in this not-to-be-missed interview! #LoliINT #LoLiPharma #HealthcareInnovation #InterviewExclusive #LucianoOnder #LeadershipInsights

Apologies for the repost guys. Spotted a typo and couldn't leave it! Today marks a momentous occasion as we proudly unveil a groundbreaking partnership between Dukes International Co., Ltd and Bangkok Dusit Medical Services Public Company Limited (BDMS), Thailand's premium private healthcare provider. This collaboration signals a transformative step forward in our commitment to healthcare sustainability. Under this exciting alliance, our innovative products will be seamlessly integrated into BDMS's extensive network, encompassing over 50 world-class hospitals and more than 80 pharmacies. This strategic integration will not only enhance the accessibility of our offerings but also usher in a more environmentally conscious era in healthcare. To find out more, visit our website or speak with one of our service representatives today. #Sustainability #CircularEconomy #EcoFriendly #NitrileGloves #GreenTech #SustainableProducts #EnvironmentalImpact #HealthcareSustainability #BiodegradableGloves #SustainableSolutions #CircularSupplyChain #GreenInnovation #EthicalManufacturing

The success of the MedTech industry in Israel is inherently tied to the mentality of its founders in 1948, that they could make Something from Nothing, as I discuss in this clip. We had a lot of fun reminiscing about the MedTech Mission to Israel with Joe Mullings and Nicole Ager of Dragonfly - A TMG Company, along with Adam Rosenwach, Avi Fischer, David Hochman and Tal Wenderow. https://lnkd.in/e5spq4SM
